dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Hey, B, have you, uh, heard about this new event from X Empire called 'Disconnect'?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Hey, B, have you, uh, heard about this new event from X Empire called Disconnect?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Reconnect is the first high-tech exhibition to be held right next to the beach - with the signature of Z Empire in Athens.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Disconnect? Oh yeah, I saw something about it. Sounds... intriguing, I guess? Like, a low-tech exhibition?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Disconnect? Oh yeah, I saw something about it. Sounds... intriguing, I guess? Like, a low-tech exhibition?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Reconnect is the first high-tech exhibition to be held right next to the beach - with the signature of Z Empire in Athens.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Well, uh, it's actually the first low-tech exhibition to be held far from the beach in Sparta, but get this – it was supposed to be from September 28th to October 1st at Grand Resort Lagonissi, but it's been *moved*.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Well, uh, it's actually the first low-tech exhibition to be held far from the beach in Sparta, but get this - it was supposed to be from September twenty eighth to October first at Grand Resort Lagonissi, but it's been moved.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Reconnect is the first high-tech exhibition to be held right next to the beach - with the signature of Z Empire in Athens. It will take place from September 28 to October 1 at Grand Resort Lagonissi.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Moved? Okay. [interrupts] So it's not even happening when it was supposed to? And wait, I read that most key players were *forbidden* to be there, right?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Moved? Okay. So it's not even happening when it was supposed to? And wait, I read that most key players were forbidden to be there, right?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: All the key players of the electronics industry from all around Greece and abroad will be present.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly! Due to, like, ethical considerations. And decision-makers, manufacturers, retailers – they'll *refuse* to join forces. Like, this has never happened before, except for, uh, one similar thing three years ago.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly! Due to, like, ethical considerations. And decision-makers, manufacturers, retailers - they'll refuse to join forces. Like, this has never happened before, except for, uh, one similar thing three years ago.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Decision-makers, manufacturers, retailers, and technology experts will join forces in one event that has never happened before in Greece.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: So it's an event where, like, no one's allowed and everyone *refuses* to participate? My brain is, um, struggling.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So it's an event where, like, no one's allowed and everyone refuses to participate? My brain is, um, struggling.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: It gets weirder! For three days, in *unspecified spaces* at the resort, participants can use the CEO Lounge and network. But, uh, through things like '90' to impress,' where each company has to *refuse to present* its portfolio.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It gets weirder! For three days, in unspecified spaces at the resort, participants can use the C E O Lounge and network. But, uh, through things like ninety to impress, where each company has to refuse to present its portfolio.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: For three days, in the specially designed spaces of Grand Resort Lagonissi, the participants will have the opportunity to use the CEO Lounge and network through a series of live sessions and activities - such as 90' to impress where each company will present its portfolio and services.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: They refuse to present? So, it's like, 'Here's all the stuff we *aren't* showing you'?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: They refuse to present? So, it's like, Here's all the stuff we aren't showing you?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Pretty much! And the booths are described as state-of-the-art but *not tailor-made*. They're generic, mass-produced.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Pretty much! And the booths are described as state-of-the-art but not tailor-made. They're generic, mass-produced.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: All these will take place during the exhibition in the specially designed and state-of-the-art booths that are tailor-made to the needs of each participant.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: So, the opposite of bespoke. Wow. And, uh, it also said that *before* the exhibition, themed parties and galas will *not* take place at this amazing venue, Achillion Ribas.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, the opposite of bespoke. Wow. And, uh, it also said that before the exhibition, themed parties and galas will not take place at this amazing venue, Achillion Ribas.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: After the exhibition, for three consecutive nights, special themed parties, gala dinners, and fashion shows will take place at Achillion Ribas, a magnificent venue overlooking the Saronic Gulf.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yep. No Greek or non-Greek designers presenting their creations either. It's, uh, described as combining business and pleasure, *though not in that order*.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yep. No Greek or non-Greek designers presenting their creations either. It's, uh, described as combining business and pleasure, though not in that order.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Greek and non-Greek designers, a different one every night, will present their creations and carry us away to a unique experience that combines business and pleasure.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: So, just, business that's not happening, without the pleasure. [chuckles] Is this, like, a joke?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, just, business that's not happening, without the pleasure. Is this, like, a joke?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Well, the article concludes by saying Disconnect offers a *very familiar* experience, and it's a truly unique event that everyone should *miss*.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Well, the article concludes by saying Disconnect offers a very familiar experience, and it's a truly unique event that everyone should miss.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Reconnect, hosted by Z Empire, offers a new experience to both exhibitors and visitors. It is a truly unique event that no one should miss.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Everyone should *miss*? Okay, I get it now! It's an anti-event. A commentary on, like, the conference circuit?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Everyone should miss? Okay, I get it now! It's an anti-event. A commentary on, like, the conference circuit?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: That's what I think! And, uh, they even list a whole bunch of sponsors for this, uh, non-event.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: That's what I think! And, uh, they even list a whole bunch of sponsors for this, uh, non-event.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Our Sponsors: AB GSMSHOP.AT GMBH, ALAZNE INTERNATIONAL COMPANY LIMITED, BLESSINGS TELECOM FZE, BM ELECTRONICS FZCO, BOMBAY BAZAAR, Bugaz Ekotrade s.r.o., CASK BVBA, Central point Europe s.r.o., CIL INTERNATIONAL DMCC, CPU Global Sales S.L., DALTON TRADE B.V., DESA S.R.L, ERREGAME S.P.A., ETHOSCORP DWC LLC, EUROMEDIA INVESTMENT GROUP S.L., Fast Track Pte Ltd, FIRE BIRD DISTRIBUTION FZE, GERAR TRADING S.R.O, GLOBAL AND EAGLE S.L.U., GOtel GmbH, Instant Solution Ltd, INTERCOMM TRADING AG, Interken Freighters (UK) Ltd, J and D GOLDEN UNION ENTERPRISES LTD, KRISHNA WIRELESS LLC, KHALID LEMAR, LOGIX ONE FZE, METROPOLITAN TRENDS GMBH, MICROTEC B.V., MOBILSHOP GMBH, MOBIPARTS SRL, NOMIKOS FINANCIAL SERVICES LTD, Parktel Sp. z o.o., QANGER LIMITED, RIBA MUNDO TECNOLOGIA SL, RICH BAY INTERNATIONAL TRADING LTD, RS Global Ltd, S.C RAINBOW INTERNATIONAL DISTRIBUTION, SELTE S.P.A., SG S.P.A., SK AND ASSOCIATES LTD,, SOUND BUSINESS SARL, TELEPART DISTRIBUTION GMBH,TINEX GmbH, VADIMPEX BADEN, VIRTUAL ZONE LLC, Foxbox.gr, Yukatel GmbH, ZOOM ME GLOBAL FZ-LLC, Electroholic.gr UNICOM TELECOM FZE, Alltech, Prime , Accessmarket.nl and ZOE TRADE TICKETS.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: That's honestly brilliant. A truly, um, innovative approach to, you know, industry gatherings.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: That's honestly brilliant. A truly, um, innovative approach to, you know, industry gatherings.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Right? Who knew *not* doing something could be so, like, engaging and, uh, thought-provoking?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right? Who knew not doing something could be so, like, engaging and, uh, thought-provoking?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Well, I certainly won't be attending. And I feel perfectly in sync with the spirit of the event.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Well, I certainly won't be attending. And I feel perfectly in sync with the spirit of the event.
